FuncDef:
The consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type command configures the M-LAG consistency check whitelist for the MAC module.
The undo consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type command cancels the M-LAG consistency check whitelist configured for the MAC module. The consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type command configures the M-LAG consistency check whitelist for the MAC module. The undo consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type command cancels the M-LAG consistency check whitelist configured for the MAC module. By default, the M-LAG consistency check whitelist is not configured for the MAC module.
CLIs: consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type { mac-aging-time | static-mac }
undo consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type { mac-aging-time | static-mac }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the MAC address aging time.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type mac-aging-time
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module mac service-type static-mac
